text: Vasile Alecsandri (21 June 1821, Bacău – 22 August 1890, Mircești) was a Romanian poet, politician, minister, and diplomat. He founded the Romanian Academy and Romanian Theatre. Category:Romanian politicians Category:Romanian poets Category:Romanian diplomats Category:Bacău County Category:1821 births Category:1890 deaths
title: Vasile Alecsandri
